name: The Morality Hunt
description:
In this world of decisions, will you make the right ones?

Will you sacrifice lives for your wellbeing? Or will you spare them and suffer yourself?

The game has 3 endings (Kind, Neutral and Cruel)

An RPG Maker MV game made for UntitledGameJam #33 (Theme: Sacrifice)

Enjoy!

UPDATE: 6/10/2020 There was a game-breaking glitch that wouldn't let you complete the Cruel ending, which has now been repaired, so you can play the game fully.
